book.synopsis: In his most gripping thriller yet, Jeffery Deaver takes readers on a terrifying ride into two ingenious minds...that of a physically challenged detective and the scheming killer he must stop. The detective was the former head of forensics at the NYPD, but is now a quadriplegic who can only exercise his mind. The killer is a man whose obsession with old New York helps him choose his next victim. Now, with the help of a beautiful young cop, this diabolical killer must be stopped before he can kill again!
book.title_long: The Bone Collector: The First Lincoln Rhyme Novel
book.dimensions: Height: 7.58 Inches, Length: 4.52 Inches, Weight: 0.5 Pounds, Width: 1.13 Inches
